name: Hungry Cats
description:
Hungry cats is a game where you play as a herd of cats trying to retrieve pieces of food scattered around the house, and bringing those pieces back to “home” base. But don’t get caught by the human or else pieces of food will be taken away.

Directions:

Point and click to move and pick up/ drop off pieces of food

Background music and cat sounds from:  Zapsplat.com
